oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Saturday Pre-Opry Show - 1957-03-09 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Saturday Pre-Opry Show, 1957-03-09, 6:00-6:30 pm, part 1. Recorded in Studio C at the National Life & Accident Insurance building. Personnel include Ott Devine (announcer), Roy Acuff (host, performer), Smoky Mountain Boys (performers), Kitty Wells (performer), Jimmy Riddle (performer), Johnnie & Jack (performers), Shot Jackson (performer), Gordon Terry (performer), Jerry Johnson (performer), Howdy Forrester (performer), and Bashful Brother Oswald (performer). Roy Acuff mentions the following program as featuring Ray Price and his Cherokee Cowboys, with announcer Dave Overton. Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/532
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Smoky Mountain Boys; Kitty Wells; Jimmy Riddle; Johnnie & Jack; Shot Jackson; Gordon Terry
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme -- Opening statement (Ott Devine) -- Opening statement (Roy Acuff) -- Roll On Buddy, Roll On (Roy Acuff and his Smoky Mountain Boys) -- Roy Acuff introduces Kitty Wells -- Repenting (Kitty Wells) -- Roy Acuff introduces Jimmy Riddle -- [Unidentified instrumental] (Jimmy Riddle, Roy Acuff) -- Roy Acuff talks about attending the Grand Ole Opry -- Roy Acuff introduces Johnnie & Jack -- Day-O (The Banana Boat Song) (Johnnie & Jack) -- Roy Acuff introduces Shot Jackson -- [Unidentified steel guitar instrumental] (Shot Jackson) -- Roy Acuff mentions Shot Jackson dedicates his performance to Ray Crisp -- Roy Acuff introduces Gordon Terry -- Gordon Terry talks -- Service With A Smile (Gordon Terry) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Life & Accident Insurance Company, Inc. (Nashville, Tenn.); Devine, Ott, 1910-1994; Acuff, Roy; Smoky Mountain Boys; Wells, Kitty; Riddle, Jimmy, 1918-1982; Johnnie & Jack; Wright, Johnnie, 1914-2011; Anglin, Jack, 1916-1963; Jackson, Shot; Crisp, Ray; Terry, Gordon; Johnson, Jerry (Bassist); Forrester, Howdy, 1922-1987; Bashful Brother Oswald; Price, Ray, 1926-2013; Cherokee Cowboys (Musical group); Overton, Dave
